## ZCurve.decodeComponent() method

Decodes a single nD component from given Z index.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static decodeComponent(z: bigint, bits: number, dims: number, offset: number): number;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  z | <code>bigint</code> | Z index |
|  bits | <code>number</code> | bits per component |
|  dims | <code>number</code> | number of dimensions |
|  offset | <code>number</code> | bit offset (for curr dimension) |

<b>Returns:</b>

`number`
